title: Ep137: 2nd Fife & Forfar Yeomanry - What's it Like?
itunes:title: Ep137: 2nd Fife & Forfar Yeomanry - What's it Like?
description:
A special episode in Pete and Gary's popular series about the 2nd Fife and Forfars, a British tank unit battling through WW2. This week the men of the unit tell 'what it's like' to experience the fighting in the Normandy bocage in Sherman tanks. Be prepared for some grim accounts!


Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain

Publisher: Mat McLachlan

Producer: Jess Stebnicki
